channel.title: Need help please
channel.description:
Hey guys i have project czar server source how do i get rid of all the member shit????
1.some weapons in the shop say u need to be member to have them ??
2.wen i log on it got if im a mem or not how i delete it ??
3.ive deleted the porals to get there and npc
All help given will be appreciated :D

item.title: Need help please
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

ummm in your playerhandler… one sec ill try and find it… cant remember off the top of my head.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 13, 2008, 01:24:49 PM[/size][hr]Look for member… till you see something sorta like this… characterfile.write("character-ismember = ", 0, 21); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(plr.playerIsMember), 0, Integer.toString(plr.playerIsMember).length()); characterfile.newLine(); also after you replace it with that then delete ur characterfile.write("character-isnonmember or something like that

Read full topic
